name: Sandcastles (EmceeEscher)
description:
An abstract game about building sandcastles, with an emotional palette torn between a relaxing day at the beach and the looming dread of climate change. 

(This is version is half-finished. After a burst of inspiration early on in development, life got in the way, and I don't think more is coming.)

Controls:

Mouse / left-right arrows: move bucket

Left  click / spacebar: drop sand

Scroll wheel / number keys: switch sand type

Up-down arrows: scroll up and down

Esc: Open menu
